description.value:
The Dawnmarshal, a general of Aminthar, is the god of righteous rebellion. Gevaderid favors those who fight oppression at great cost. His blazing sword is the promised dawn, even in the darkest nights.

Edicts: Avenge the wronged, destroy evildoers, lead the charge in battle.

Anathema: Cower from combat, forgive those who have irreparably sinned, leave allies unwillingly in darkness.

Areas of Concern: Devotion, hope, uprisings, the dawn.
